title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: For auction is a 2021 Kialara Silver Series "Exogenesis" 10,000,000 sats w/ 4mm stoneThis is only 1 of 21 bars and numbered #19!!!The bar contains a piece of the Jepara gemstones which came from a meteoriteOriginal page: https://kialara.com/product/silver-series-2021-exogenesis/*Comes with official Kialara case and velvet pouch*STARTING BID: 0.100BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 3 decimal places**END TIME: MAY 27nd, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: About 6.5 hours left.Don't miss out on owning a piece of outer space!!

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: cygan on May 27, 2023, 08:39:15 PM0.1BTCWinnerThank you for the bid
